## roundFloatAndConvertMicrosecondsToMS() function

Round a float in microseconds and convert it to milliseconds

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function roundFloatAndConvertMicrosecondsToMS(ms: string | number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ms | string \| number | Microseconds float as a string or number |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
